TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataFieldConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换器，它可从当前组件的选定数据源中检索数据字段的列表。

span.span: Provides a type converter that can retrieve a list of data fields from the current component's selected data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以从设计时组件的当前数据源检索的数据字段的列表。 can retrieve a list of data fields from the current data source of a design-time component. 使用此类型转换器[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]提供数据的列表中显示属性窗口中的字段的值。This type converter is used by [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] to provide the values that appear in the list of data fields in the Properties window. > [!CAUTION] > 永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). ## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#3)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示转换器是否可以将指定源类型的对象转换为转换器的本机类型。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the converter can convert an object of the specified source type to the native type of the converter.

returns.span: 如果转换器能执行转换，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回`true`如果源类型为字符串。This method returns `true` if the source type is a string. 否则，此方法始终返回`false`。Otherwise, this method always returns `false`.

span.para: 重写此方法，以满足您自己的转换需求。参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。它可能是，因此应始终对其进行检查。此外，属性对象也可能返回。

Override this method to meet your own conversion requirements. The parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment the converter is being invoked from. It might be , so you should always check. Also, properties of the object might also return .

summary.span: 如果可以得到关于存在于选定数据源内的数据字段的信息，则获取这些数据字段。

span.span: Gets the data fields present within the selected data source if information about them is available.

returns.span: ，它列出标准的可访问数据源。

span.span: A listing the standard accessible data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用组件的设计器来检索所选的数据源上的实现。This method uses the implementation on the component's designer to retrieve the selected data source.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示从 返回的标准值集合是否为所有可能值的列表。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the collection of standard values returned from is a list of all possible values.

returns.span: 如果从 返回的 是所有可能的有效值的排他列表，则为 ；如果还可能有其他值，则为 。

span.span: if the returned from is an exclusive list of all possible values that are valid; if other values are possible.

returns.span: 当在此类中实现时，此方法始终返回 。

span.span: As implemented in this class, this method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该列表是独占的（如在枚举数据类型中），则其他任何值都无效。If the list is exclusive, such as in an enumeration data type, then no other values are valid. 如果该列表不是独占的则没有其他有效的值的标准列表值之外提供。If the list is not exclusive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides.

span.para: 如果你想要转换的类型支持标准值，重写此方法。参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。它可能是，因此应始终对其进行检查。此外，属性对象也可能返回。

Override this method if the type you want to convert supports standard values. The parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment the converter is being invoked from. It might be , so you should always check. Also, properties of the object might also return .
